data.introduce: 该接口用于国际税信息查询。对应黑屏指令 XS FXT
data.functions:
该接口用于国际税信息查询。对应黑屏指令 XS FXT。
1、支持通过城市、机场三字码查询税种。
2、支持通过国家代码查询税种
3、支持指定国家和税种查询
data.requestSchema:
[{"name":"TES_AirFareTaxListRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"国际税信息查询接口","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"AirFareTaxListInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"","children":[{"name":"AirportCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"三字城市码、机场码，需转换成城市、机场所在的国家
                            代码 可单独使用，用于列出指定国家适用的所有税收。 不能和CountryCode一起使用","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"税项代码。不可单独使用，
                            指定TaxCode时，前面必须指定AirportCityCode或CountryCode的其中一项","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"FareSkyTaxTextPos","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"","children":[{"name":"Pos","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","description":"机场、城市三字代码","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"TaxType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"税类型。三位数字。不可单 独使用。指定Taxtype时，
                            前面必须指定AirportCityCode或CountryCode的其中一项以及TaxCode","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"SalesDate","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"销售日期，如果不指定默认系统当天日期（GTM时 间）。当天及未来日期均传入ticketingdate，历史日期传入livedate","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"CountryCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"根据国家代码查询税项信息。 可单独使用，用于列出指定国家适用的所有税收。 不能和AirportCityCode一起使用","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirFareTaxListRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际税信息查询接口返回","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"返回结果,此节点下时调用后台返回的xml结果","children":[{"name":"TSK_AirfarePrice","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Response","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FareskyTaxTextRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"TaxCodeDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税项的详细信息展示","children":[{"name":"TaxCodeDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TaxTexts","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TaxText","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税的详细信息，逐行展示 全部转换成大写字母展示","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TaxName","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税的名称","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Refundable","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"表示是否允许退改。","children":[]},{"name":"@TaxCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Taxtype","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"@CountryCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@SalesDate","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"TaskID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"Token","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":403,"name":"","msg":"用户名、密码、IP 错误或无权限","msgZh":""}]
